name: Vanilla Apricot - Whipped Argan Oil Refillable Firming Body Butter Jar
categories: Bath & Body, Body Moisturizers, Body Lotions & Body Oils
about: What it is: An air-whipped full-body moisturizer with argan oil that rapidly soaks in, delivering juicy firmness, intense hydration, and an all-over glow.Fragrance Family: Fresh.Scent Type: Fresh Citrus & Fruits.Key Notes: Ripe Apricot & VanillaFragrance Description: A blend of sun-ripened apricot and warm Madagascan vanilla is heightened with a juicy twist of Valencia orange. Itu2019s summer holidays, with a twist.About the Fragrance: As fragrance purists and planet lovers, Josie Maran uses only 100 percent plant-based essences: real fruits, nuts, woods, and plants. Because nothing beats the real thing..Highlighted Ingredients:- Argan Oil: An abundant source of essential fatty acids, antioxidants, and vitamin E..- Avocado Oil: Known to improve the look of skin elasticity and firmness, rich in antioxidants..- Shea Butter: Known to moisturize and soothe, helping skin stay supple...What Else You Need to Know: This body butter absorbs rapidly on dry skin for a velvety-soft and firming finish that lasts all day. Responsibly sourced argan is whipped to creamy perfection with 100 percent plant-based fragrances in a lightweight yet rich formula. With the refill system, top up your amber glass jar and reuse forever...Research Results: In a consumer perception survey of 39 people using the body butter on their thighs, stomach, and arms:.- 100% agreed their skin felt deeply hydrated and moisturized throughout the day after one use.- 97% agreed that the product provided an instant glow after one use.- 97% saw a noticeable improvement in firmness and tone after 2 weeks.Clean & Planet AwareOur ambitious curation of beauty made without controversial ingredients from brands dedicated to making meaningful environmental commitments, including sustainable ingredients and sourcing, packaging, corporate commitments, and consumer transparency.

how_to_use: Suggested Usage:.-Massage generously into skin for an instant moisture boost..Josieu2019s tip:.-For best results, use after showering when pores are open and receptive to the whipped, velvety goodness....Recycling Instructions:.-Remove the cap of the jar, remove red liner from inside the cap, rinse both cap and jar thoroughly, and drop the separated jar and cap in your at-home recycling bin..-Liner can be recycled through TerraCycle. Flatten product box and drop in your at-home recycling bin..-Recycle pouch through TerraCycle....Refill Product Instructions:.-With the refill pouches, you can top up your gorgeous amber glass jar and reuse it forever. reviews.review_title: Fave product for years, however getting shady
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brunette hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: This has been my favorite body butter for years. However, I did email customer service and ask why the product is now 6oz instead of 8oz, for the same price. Their response? unfortunately we don't have access to this information. This was kind of off-putting for someone who's a long term customer. It's getting hard to justify $49 CAD for 2 oz less, as 8oz was already not enough product for the price. I'd say wait for the gift sets and value sets around the holiday season- this is when they have more bang for your buck. Just something to be aware of ud83dudc4d

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, red hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I was so excited to see this product back since it's one of my absolute favorite body moisturizers - the vanilla apricot scent on my current original one is incredible. But after seeing that the standard size is now 2oz less than the original (from 8oz to 6oz, albeit for $2 less), there's really no way I can justify the cost now. Nearly $40 for a body butter was already a lot but the fact that it's that much less product now, it feels ridiculous.
